replies.body:
IMO I like it the way it is.

Elise being pure red just feels awkward since her base skin is black and red.

Hey! 

This was one of the first skins I worked on, and the color of the skin was discussed **a ton** in the community. Believe it or not, she was originally wicked pink! There's a method behind the madness in terms of why her outfit is the color it is.

http://s3.amazonaws.com/leaguesales/images/imgs/000/000/978/original/blood-moon-elise-02.jpg

Players had a lot to say about her being pink and not reading as Blood Moon. So, we took it back for discussion and 100% agreed with the community, so we made her really red. 

Once players saw the new one, there became a 50/50 split as to which color was preferred, and which looked better for the thematic. Once again, the team got together and discussed what we would do that would make the community happy, but would also be the best option for Blood Moon Elise.

The result? We opted for a happy medium (a reddish pink), that meshed better with the gold pieces, and also kept her away from being too red, since her base model uses red.

http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Nxqh53j-BNo/VII1TEHWxpI/AAAAAAAAfBY/ErIxDUbMQUI/s1600/elise1.jpg
She is already red though? It's not a deep red, but it is a shade of red and she looks just fine as is.
